title: 5. Remove a Collector
name: DeleteCollector

permission.name: TokenAccess
permission.title: The Client must have a token that allows it to get access on this resource.

description: Collector are responsible for read RFID records from antennas and pass it to the server. Use this URI to remove a collector from database.

title: 1. Get array of Collectors
name: GetCollectors

permission.name: TokenAccess
permission.title: The Client must have a token that allows it to get access on this resource.

description: Collector are responsible for read RFID records from antennas and pass it to the server. Use this URI to search on platform for Collectors that match the given query or all the availables collectors.

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content: curl -i https://localhost/api/collectors

examples.title: Query Example:
examples.content: curl -i https://localhost/api/collectors?q={"limit": 2}
